title: Slicing tensors with negative steps
body_html: It'd be nice to be able to slice tensors using a negative step such as tensor[::-1] or tenso[:, ::-1, :] like what is possible with numpy or theano. It'll make implementing things like bidirectional RNNs (without using the inbuilt RNN modules) simpler.
